text: Is Margot Robbie pregnant? Reports claim Wolf Of Wall Street actress is expecting her first child with new husband Tom Ackerley MARGOT Robbie recently confirmed she had married husband Tom Ackerley, in a secret ceremony. Margot Robbie is pregnant with her first child – according to reports [ Getty ] But has the I Tonya actress got even more news for us? According to reports, the 27 year old is pregnant with her first child. NW magazine claim she debuted her bump on the red carpet at the Hollywood Film Awards, earlier this month, opting for a ‘ billowy ’ dress to cover her figure. Margot Robbie sparked pregnancy rumours over this outfit [ Wenn ]'' Someone was overheard saying Margot wanted something billowy to wear that hid her mid - section,'' an insider
